thread.title: Life's a drag for Jason Donovan
thread.title_full: Life's a drag for Jason Donovan | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Life's a drag for Jason Donovan
text:
Life's a drag for Jason Donovan Australian heart throb Jason Donovan is donning sequins and glitter to appear in the award winning musical Priscilla Queen of the Desert.
The boy from Down Under is in Bradford where the show is being performed this week at the Alhambra theatre, before moving onto York at the end of November.
The musical is an uplifting story of three friends who hop aboard a battered bus searching for love and friendship and end up with more than they could ever have dreamed of.
Last updated Tue 13 Oct 2015 Entertainment West Yorkshire Bradford
